abstract: China National Chemical Engineering will raise as much as $980 million in an initial public offering in Shanghai.
snippet: China National Chemical Engineering will raise as much as $980 million in an initial public offering in Shanghai.
lead_paragraph: China National Chemical Engineering will raise as much as 6.70 billion renminbi ($980 million) in an initial public offering, Reuters reported.

headline.main: China Nat’l Chemical Plans $980 Million I.P.O.
